io.springlets.web.mvc.support

Class SimpleMethodLinkBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.springlets.web.mvc.support.SimpleMethodLinkBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the class of the Controller to create links to
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MethodLinkBuilder<T>

    public class SimpleMethodLinkBuilder<T>
extends Object
implements MethodLinkBuilder<T>
    Simple MethodLinkBuilder implementation which delegates the creation of UriComponents instances to its Controller methods through a MethodLinkFactory of the same Controller.
    Author:
    Cèsar Ordiñana at http://www.disid.com[DISID Corporation S.L.]

      Creates a builder for a Controller's method with the given options.

      • SimpleMethodLinkBuilder

        public SimpleMethodLinkBuilder(MethodLinkFactory<T> linkFactory,
                               String methodName,
                               Set<io.springlets.web.mvc.support.SimpleMethodLinkBuilder.ParameterIndex> parameters,
                               Map<String,Object> pathVariables)
        Creates a builder for a Controller's method with the given options.
        Parameters:
        linkFactory - to use to create the links
        methodName - the name of the Controller's method
        parameters - of the method
        pathVariables - path variables defined in the the RequestMapping of the method to be replaced

      • with

        public MethodLinkBuilder<T> with(String variable,
                                 Object value)
        Description copied from interface: MethodLinkBuilder
        Adds a path variable to build the method URI. The variable name must be the same as the one included between {} clauses in the RequestMapping of the method.
        Specified by:
        with in interface MethodLinkBuilder<T>
        Parameters:
        variable - name of the path variable
        value - value to replace with
        Returns:
        the builder with the given path variable
